backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented chess features and the files they touch.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the role of each frontend file.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling game screens, settings, dialogs, board rendering, and pawn promotion handling.
frontend/src/features/chess/ai/evaluatio: AI evaluation logic with piece values, piece-square tables, personality weighting, and win‑probability conversion.
frontend/src/features/chess/ai/getAiMove: Wrapper that returns the best AI move using the search engine.
frontend/src/features/chess/ai/search.ts: Minimax with alpha‑beta, difficulty‑based depth, and randomness for evaluating and selecting AI moves.
frontend/src/features/chess/animation/an: Type definition for animated chess moves including timing and square data.
frontend/src/features/chess/board2d/Boar: 2D chessboard UI rendering squares, pieces, move highlights, and animations.
frontend/src/features/chess/board2d/piec: Renders 2D chess pieces using Unicode symbols.
frontend/src/features/chess/board3d/Boar: Renders a 3D chessboard using react-three-fiber with lighting, camera controls, and animated piece movement.
frontend/src/features/chess/board3d/piec: Defines 3D geometries and materials for all chess pieces with custom shapes and shading.
frontend/src/features/chess/engine/chess: Implements chess rules including move generation, attack detection, board setup, and game state creation.
frontend/src/features/chess/engine/types: Contains TypeScript type definitions for pieces, positions, moves, and game state.
frontend/src/features/chess/settings/Res: Dialog component prompting users to confirm restarting the game when settings change.
frontend/src/features/chess/settings/Set: UI panel for selecting game settings such as board mode, difficulty, personality, player name, and color.
frontend/src/features/chess/settings/typ: Defines types for settings options including board mode, difficulty, personality, and player color.
frontend/src/features/chess/state/useChe: React hook managing game state, player input, AI turns, move execution, promotions, and animations.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/CapturedP: Displays pieces captured by each player by deriving and sorting them from move history.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/GameStatu: Shows current turn, check status, game result messages, and selected game settings.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/MoveHisto: Formats and displays move history in paired rows with basic notation and special move handling.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/NewGameBu: Provides a button that triggers a new game action.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/PawnPromo: Renders a modal overlay for selecting a pawn promotion piece with optional cancel action.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/PreGameSc: Displays initial configuration UI for game settings and a start-game button.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/QuitButto: Button component that triggers a quit-game action.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/QuitConfi: Confirmation dialog asking the user to confirm quitting the current game.
frontend/src/features/chess/ui/WinProbab: Calculates and displays win probability percentages for white and black based on game state and evaluation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the chess game.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping App with InternetIdentity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including requirements to rebuild pawn promotion and improve full chess rules validation.
